name: Tower Of Ra
description:
Tower of Ra is a 2-player local-multiplayer game where you build towers or craft weapons to destroy other's tower layers using different resources available. This game is created by a group of 5 NTU ADM game students.
Jay: Producer, Programmer
Toi: Art Lead (Concept, Characters)
Arisa: Design Lead, Artist (Environment)
Grace: Designer, Programmer
Nicole: Designer, Artist (UI/UX)

Menu BGM: "Fight or Flight" by Heatley Bros
Game BGM: "Enemy Attacks" by Heatley Bros
Font used: Alagard
